sentences.en: A typhoon in 1954 sank a ferry, drowning 1,218 people.
sentences.cn: 一九五四年的一次台风刮沉了一艘渡轮, 淹死一千二百十八人.

sentences.en: A typhoon is now approaching Hong Kong.
In May a typhoon hit the Philippines.
It has called the typhoon the worst natural disaster in South Korea in many years.
sentences.cn: 它称这次台风为韩国多年来最严重的自然灾害。

sentences.en: The football match have to stand over next week for the typhoon storm.
sentences.cn: 由于台风风暴，这场足球赛延期到下个星期举行。

sentences.en: The punch line was that he lost his pants in the typhoon.
sentences.cn: 好笑的是他在台风中掉了裤子.

sentences.en: The radio bulletin warned of the typhoon.
sentences.cn: 收音机新闻快报发布了台风警报。

sentences.en: The typhoon had spent its fury.
sentences.cn: 台风的势头已经减弱了。

sentences.en: The typhoon hit the coastal areas.

sentences.cn: 台风的风力正逐渐增强.

sentences.en: The typhoon left chaos behind it.
The typhoon pulled up many trees by the roots.
sentences.cn: 台风把许多树连根拔了起来.

sentences.en: The typhoon sank a ferry, drowning over 200 people.
sentences.cn: 那场台风使一条渡船沉没, 淹死200多人.
台风把许多树连根拔起.

sentences.en: There was a threat of typhoon.
They have received notice of a typhoon approaching.
sentences.cn: 他们已收到台风即将来临的预报。

sentences.en: We both are under stress and standing in the middle of a typhoon .
sentences.cn: 你我都处在很紧张的环境中，站在台风的中心。

sentences.en: When the typhoon struck, we were afraid our ship might not be able to weather the storm.
sentences.cn: 当台风袭来的时候, 我们生怕我们的船经受不住狂风暴雨.
